website_summaries.verdict: Attractive, warm, fairly lightweight, and versatile blanket that's easy to clean. With the possible exception of extremely cold nights, it will match most consumers' needs.
pros: Made of polyester down alternative that's warm yet breathable
Comes in twin, full/queen, and king and choice of several colors
cons: Some reports of stitching coming loose over time
Might not be warm enough for severely cold temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't drape over the sides as picture shows
customer_reviews.text: We use these blankets in our Bed and Breakfast and have done so for 10+ years. We love how they last. Only complaint is how little extra fabric is on the sides. It does not look like the pictures show. If you and your partner fight over blankets, buy one size up. For example, a king bed is 76 inches wide while this king blanket is only 90, leaving a mere 7 inches per side.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Riley

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is extremely poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The aesthetics of this blanket are not misrepresented. The blanket is beautiful and the muted champagne gold color is fabulous but the stitching is aweful. The blanket is coming apart in three places and actually losing the cotton fill. I have not even washed it yet... very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Cozy
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my full-size Murphy bed since there needs to be little to no fabric on the sides so it will close properly. I use this over a warm blanket, and my house guests have said they sleep cozy warm under it. My cat loves it and is napping on it right now.
customer_reviews.author: KJH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful aqua blue color: check! Warm and cozy: check! Quality: Meh Love this because the color matches perfectly, it really is true to color. It’s also very warm but lightweight. However, the quality is bad. There were loose threads hanging off as soon as I opened package. I’m not sure if I’m going to keep it. I kinda want to see how it does after washing, but at that point I’m not sure I can return it. So I dunno, for $60 I think this was not worth the money. If I paid $20 for it, I wouldn’t even complain.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ward

customer_reviews.title: I love that it's really light but also warm when you ...
customer_reviews.text: I just put this blanket on my master bed a few months ago. I love that it's really light but also warm when you need it. I think it's going to be perfect for the Texas summer nights. I've watched it several times and seems to wash well. The gray color is really nice and subtle.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a nice blanket. However, I do not like that it does not slide on your sheets. It sticks and does not glide. OH and if you have pets...be aware pet hair sticks like glue!
customer_reviews.author: joanne h.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Have returned this beautifully photographed and enticingly described down alternative blanket Compares poorly to another that I have used for two summers with
customer_reviews.author: verified purchase

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight BUT Warm!
customer_reviews.text: I’m SO glad I found these! We have Sleep Number King Split Beds. Since my Husband just passed, I decided to “convert” beds into twins so I don’t have to make up HUGE King bed every day (changing bed is really tough). Without changing integrity of bed, I was able to redo w/Twin XL Sheets& these GORGEOUS Blankets. Lightweight, but warm. Truly beautiful & easy to manage. I’m so happy I went in this direction w/THESE blankets!!
customer_reviews.author: KatLady

customer_reviews.title: Ivory in daylight, yellowish at night 😊
customer_reviews.text: Feel great...not too light or too heavy. I just opened it so cannot comment on durability. The color ivory is not what I wanted. This one is like a vanilla ice cream color, which to me is leaning towards yellow. The pic I posted has pure white pillows, an ivory sham, and then this comforter, which is yellow peachy in my room with my type lighting. Not sure I’m keeping it. Maybe it will grow on me. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful blanket. I have a queen sized bed and this blanket is a double/queen. It fits my queen just fine. Because it's quilted, it actually doubles as a spread or duvet or comforter because it has such a "finished" look. I ordered blue and I plan to order two more of these blankets for my guests rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rosemary R. Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Even blood left no stain!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the texture, and the Scotchguard. I got blood on this blanket and there is no stain! The only cons is the amount of time it takes in my dryer to dry on low/delicate and that it seems to keep a wrinkled look about it even taken straight out of the dryer. Looks like it might be reversible, and I asked if both sides are scotchguarded in the questions. Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki513

customer_reviews.title: Was great before washing
customer_reviews.text: This blanket had everything I was looking for. It’s lightweight, soft, and a good price. I should have known it was to go to be true. After one, that’s one washing, following the washing instructions on the tag, the blanket came out of the dryer undone at the seem. The threads are all tangled up, the satin apart from the fabric and the inside poly-fill showing. If you want a disposable blanket because you hate laundry, this is perfect for you. If you want a blanket to use more than once, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: JUST PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these Queen size blankets (one as a spare) to use as a bedspread on a full size bed with a raised wood frame. The blanket fits perfectly on the bed and covers the box spring. Nice and soft material with a medium weight. Bought the colors Blue and Seafoam and they are light pastel in tone and very pretty! Will be mainly used for the winter months with an additional lightweight cotton blanket if needed. I live in a Southern California valley area and though we don't get snow, the nights can get very chilly especially during a heavy rainstorm. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aquamarine

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed !!
customer_reviews.text: This color looks very rich. I ordered the king size for my queen bed, so it is longer on the sides and looks really good. It actually acts like a bed spread, so I don't bother with one during the summer. You have to tuck in a lot at the bottom, but it sure does stay secure that way, and making the bed is much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: low quality threw it out!
customer_reviews.text: Though it says it is 100% polyester, it made me sneeze. Probably the dye used for the color because the color also came off on my clothing and ruined at least 2 items that cost more than the blanket to replace. Ugh! I then tried washing it which solved the color problem. It also has almost no pile filling - it is not warm, it is like two sheets sewn together with nothing in between. In the end you will save money by not buying it and avoid all the other problems. I am shopping for a replacement so overall this $25 item will cost me well over $100. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Fleeter

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket looks and feels like a much more expensive bedding item! I cannot praise it enough. It comes beautifully packaged and is soooo soft to the touch, I couldn’t wait to get it on our bed. I washed it first and it looked and felt like new right out of the dryer! It drapes nicely and is easy to make, even on our Cal King bed. My husband noticed it right away and commented on the softness of the fabric. It keeps us warm but not hot, which is perfect for So Cal temps! So very impressed, I am buying another for our guest bed!
customer_reviews.author: L. Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for summer spring and fall but a little too light weight for winter. I usually run hot at night time and this seems to be light weight enough for me so that I don’t wake up sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous123

customer_reviews.title: Product exactly as described and pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color! Ordered the sage green and it coordinated perfectly with the sheets I had ordered from another seller. Lightweight enough for warmer temperatures yet warm enough for chilly nights. Very pleased with this purchase! Cannot speak for durability as I have not had it long enough to rate it. As you can see from the photo, it was ordered for use on a hospital bed and it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket. I don't get so hot at night but it still is very warm and very light. The beige is a very nice color for my room since the paint is beige. The fabric doesn't make that crunching noise that another one did. It's very soft and cuddly. I got one in a King and one in a queen size and both fit the bed very nicely with some over the sides like you'd want it. Also, it was delivered very quickly to NYC.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Such a great find!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BLANKET! We are using it on our bed for a bedspread and as the blanket. We love it. It's warm enough for winter nights in New England, but not heavy at all!! Such a great price. I read some reviews that said the silk edging came unstitched. Ours is fine. I haven't washed it yet but would be an easy fix if necessary... For the price I would be willing to stitch a few spots. I ordered a king size to drape over our queen size bed like a bedspread. It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Soiled when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: When we unzipped the protective packaging and folded back a corner of the blanket, the satin edging was soiled as well as a small area on the blanket. We did not remove it entirely from the packaging to see if there were other dirty places. We returned it and did not order a replacement. It also did not seem to be a smooth-feeling microfiber material. Very disappointed in the quality as well as the soiled condition.
customer_reviews.author: sugar_elephant51

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Cheap. Buy the Cambria.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap knockoff of the Madison Park Cambria. Unfortunately, they use the same video in the description. Two different products. For the $15 more, the Cambria is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Magical Wanda

customer_reviews.title: So soft and so comfortable! Not heavy at all but warm enough!
customer_reviews.text: So I live in a humid environment but with it being one of the colder months I needed a blanket that was soft, stain-and sweat-resistant (my boyfriend sweats a lot and is a human heater) but also was light enough that it didn't feel hot during the night. I needed a blanket that would keep me warm but also be breathable. I was hesitant at first but I actually love this blanket. So easy to clean and throw in the washer, and does everything that it said it would. I picked white and its quilted pattern with satin edges is so clean and pretty. Great quality for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Vo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft
customer_reviews.text: The first thing that strikes me is how soft the blanket is. The material doesn't feel very thick so not sure how it will wash but for now, it feels very comfortable when lying under it. I tend to be on the hot side and after using it for a few days I can tell you that I've not had an issue with it being too warm. Right now the only issue I have is the sea foam color is mediocre. Unfortunately it's not exactly the color I needed but it was the closest available. I'll keep the blanket but which the color was a little deeper - the tone cheapens the look.
customer_reviews.author: CMC_UT

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight feel but comfy-warm in a cool room. Looks very nice. Color is great and has a good feel. Doesn't slide off the bed and I am a restless sleeper. On a normal twin bed I wish it hung down further on the sides of the bed. No flaws or imperfections. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Carver

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shade of Frost Blue but can't remove the wrinkles!
customer_reviews.text: This summer comforter is for my daughter. She really liked how soft it is. I like that is very pretty light blue, like a frost light blue. The only thing I wish is that the wrinkles would go away. I was hoping they would go away in the wash because I wash first before I put anything on a bed but it has not and it has not smooth it out I'm hoping it will eventually 4 takes away from its looks having these packing wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Evita

customer_reviews.title: Cat LOVES it. Purrrfect 😄
customer_reviews.text: Cat refuses to leave the blanket. Spends almost 24 hours a day on it. Odd. Good gift for a cat though. If you have a cat, just go ahead and get the blanket for the cat. The blanket is as thin as they come, barely any fill. Terrible for winter but probably good for summer. Shockingly soft and comfy considering its thin nature. Plain, clean design, but attractive enough. The cat has no complaints whatsoever though.

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product is decent quality but not great quality. I noted on some reviews that there were issues with the stitching and I can see how that could happen. Mine does not initially have any missed stitches or pulled stitches. But, I can see that with regular use and washing, it will not hold up for very long. The item is very soft and was event softer (as expected) after washing. It is pretty light weight, and feels nice for warmer evenings.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket ever!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite blanket! I am a hot sleeper, meaning I seem to get hot very easily while sleeping even in cooler temperatures. My husband on the other hand likes to be warmer when sleeping. This has always led to issues with a blanket to share as I would either be too hot or he would be too cold. This comforter has solved that problem completely! It’s incredibly lightweight and breathable while also being warm enough ok cooler Pennsylvania nights. I would recommend this blanket to anyone who likes to sleep with a blanket without sweating to death!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful blanket and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fantastic, I love the color! It is not heavy at all. I washed it on the gentle cycle and dried it on medium heat. I had no problems whatsoever. I am very happy with my purchase, this blanket is high end in looks and quality at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: At first when the box arrived I was not happy how small the box was however, don’t let the size fool you lol it fit my king size bed. I was a tad disappointed, it was not as soft as I would have hoped for but the price was great. Even though this was very thin it still keeps me very comfortable at night. I loved the price so mush I purchased another one for a friend. It does drape well over the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: OK But Wouldn't Buy Again....
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight yet warm. Size shown as 90"x96" but blanket I received is only 90"x90". Washes and drys well. Only problem is lots of the fill came out of the blanket during wash cycle. OK, but would NOT purchase again...
customer_reviews.author: NMGal

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Great Value, Won't Slide Off The Bed
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight blanket fits my king size bed perfectly. (It replaces a microfiber blanket that will not stay in place. It slides to the side because of the direction the fibers are woven.) I was very pleased when I woke up this morning with the blanket still in place and not touching the floor on my side of the bed. A Great Value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Not light pink
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty...but I thought it was going to be light pink... mines more of an orange/pink or coral. Totally doesn’t match my daughters room. So I’m disappointed. Though the quality seems nice.
customer_reviews.author: CTenney22

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and thin
customer_reviews.text: This blanket loses all of its structure when washed...gets thin and ravels...
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few months to review and now that I have I can confidently say this is truly a light weight comforter. I live in south TX and summers here are unbearable. This is light enough to keep you cool but thick enough for a summer blanket. Highly recommend if you want a summer comforter
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket I've had in a while!
customer_reviews.text: The blanket looks great on the bed and is large enough to cover the bed with two of us. Really appreciate the Scotchgard as it's light in color. I like the light weight, also; don't want to feel trapped under a blanket. I'm sure the soft microfiber will wash nicely and dry quickly. Love the satin trim.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket
customer_reviews.text: My room gets pretty cold at night so I bought this hoping to add extra warmth & it did the trick. I love having a lot of blankets & this one topped it off because while it provides warmth it’s also comfy, silky, lightweight, & soft at the same time. It also completes my bed & makes it look really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I purchased the king size for my queen size bed in color: Seafoam Just received today and it fits exactly how I wanted. Super long and hangs over the sides perfectly. Love the color and exactly as shown. Double checked after reading some other reviews for staining or pulled strings. Absolutely nothing! Haven’t tried it yet but will update my review to let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Soderling

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is perfect! we have a few cold days in Florida ...
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is perfect! we have a few cold days in Florida and this is not heavy, it's just enough to keep you warm. The grey is a nice version of grey that should match any decor. I have also washed it and it came out of the washer and dryer as nice as the day I opened the package. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Turnbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for...
customer_reviews.text: The blanket has more of a fleece blanket feel than the cooling down comforter sort of feel I am looking for. The blanket has a nice color and look but it is too lightweight for my comfort. I will be sending back.
customer_reviews.author: JillHdz

customer_reviews.title: Light and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for both the price and the info that it is thick enough but not too bulky. It turns out to work very well. It is lightweight but warm. I keep it between a light fleece blanket and the bed cover, and together they keep me taosty warm without the feeling of being pressed upon.
customer_reviews.author: Runner123

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft, Lightweight, and Warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. It's very soft, lightweight, and really easy to clean. Somehow I got peanut butter on it (seriously, no idea how) and it came right out with a little soap and water. So I'm grateful. If there were a drawback, it'd be that the feel of it is a little too synthetic or polyester-like, perhaps to help with the anti-staining feature. BUT, overall that's a very small downside, and I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Antonucci

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant aqua color brightened up my bedroom. Lovely design--satin edging a lux touch. Lightweight but keeps me warm. Only issue is that its too short--more like queen sized rather than over sized king. Otherwise, a great value and beautiful to look at.
customer_reviews.author: ids

customer_reviews.title: Does not help with dog hair
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be soft and lightweight. I bought this because it said it helped with dog hair not sticking to it. It’s definitely not helped with this. Dog hair stays on the blanket and is hard to remove. Also, it seems the quality of the material isn’t up to extreme par either. But I guess you get what you pay for. All in all, if you’re not worried about dog hair, you’re good!
customer_reviews.author: Tate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer blanket
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this blanket for summer time. It is just what I wanted, light weight but keeps you comfortable for summer time sleeping. Nicely drapes over the bed and I personally like the touch of the satin trim on the edges of the blanket. Great quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Alphons Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, will eventually buy another.
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised on how well this is made because the price is lower than most. I like that it’s not heavy. It will be perfect for a Texas Winter. If we ever have winter again...Have gad several months now and washed frequently due to pets on bed. Still perfect and Keeping me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mary j

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This would have been ok if it was truly an oversized king but its doesn't even cover the full side of the top mattress ! Too short
customer_reviews.author: anthony crianza jr

customer_reviews.title: Just right. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect warm but not too-warm blanket. I later it between a sheet and a thin bedspread, and with my "human furnace" spouse - this is the perfect weight to keep me comfortable even through deep winter in upstate NY. Soft, looks good, has held up pretty well to a year of frequent washing other than minor tearing around the satin hem and a bit of pilling where it gets tucked in to my "rustic wood" platform bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful blankets!
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love these blankets! The square stitching makes it easy to line up along the edge of the bed and the quality is great! Also my guests have commented on how much they like the blankets and I have given them the link so they may order their own!
customer_reviews.author: rere

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a blanket I love. This blanket is well made, soft and comfortable. It somehow provides some warmth, without being too warm. It has a breathable aspect to it. I believe this will be my new, official Summer blanket. I am considering buyng additional in other colors, to maybe layer in the colder months. The microfiber is very soft, and so is the satin edging. It came with ZERO loose threads, and appears to be very well made. I think it is a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: summer sleeping weight
customer_reviews.text: I like this style of blanket: lightweight, satin-edged, easily washable. The stitching is slightly less high quality than other blankets like this that I have owned, in that one thread has already snapped. The fabric is microfiber, which feels nice, but traps dog hair, and that is why I have to be able to wash the blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara1968

customer_reviews.title: It’s not very thick or heavy. Perfect for Spring & Summer
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great size and fits the bed well. It’s a little lighter than I wanted but it was advertised as light weight so I think it’ll be OK. I love it though. Its very nice and it washed nicely
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Kay Gamache

customer_reviews.title: Arrived new in package with small yellow stain! I ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived new in package with small yellow stain! I didn’t even take it out of the package because I have no interest in a new already stained blanket, but the fabric also feels very light weight and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I just washed it out of the box and it held up fine.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I have an air conditioner about 1-2 ft from my bed. With a thicker blanket I get hot sweats but cold from A/C. This is exactly what I need!
customer_reviews.author: AVW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with with blanket. The trim is very wide and feels really cheap. The trim feels like ribbon instead of silky. The blanket itself it average soft. I will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Warm but not too heavy!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is soft, breathable & not too heavy. I am a warm sleeper & I stay nice & warm but not too warm especially in the cold ND winters. Holds up well in the washing machine & dryer!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Will Do the Job
customer_reviews.text: We have the king version, and needed the twin so there'd be room for a twin-size weighted blanket on the other side of the bed. These are nice blankets. My husband doesn't like a heavy blanket, but this keeps him warm most nights.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Law

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket
customer_reviews.text: I'm exceptionally happy with this blanket, it's a nice medium weight and fluffy enough to give you that wrapped in clouds feeling. It's also good for layering, holding heat without getting massively hot. Best blanket I've bought, maybe ever.
customer_reviews.author: Tiwohunter

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bed Again!!
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom. It's perfect and very pretty. My favorite color will always be PINK. But when you pick out certain blankets or Comforters you need to be careful it can look very child like when Choosing the right color pink.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Light blanket , we love it .
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for California weather , husband and I got hot too quick and this blanket working for us... he doesn’t like heavy blanket , this one is nice and light . We preferred this than fluffy blanket .
customer_reviews.author: Nita Califano

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would not be as warm as it is as I like a nice cool blanket, this is so lite that it barely touches you and yet so incredibly warm. It will be nice for the winter
customer_reviews.author: Ariyah

customer_reviews.title: I got what I paid for.....
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight, color is vivid, warm....... quilting stitching is poor. I had to trim a lot of loose threads and then re-sew on my sewing machine. I chose not to return it because I like the blanket and I sew all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, my hubby and I both love this, its so soft & fluffy, its lightweight which is what we were looking for, doesn't wrinkle, nor does it make a noise as Downs do, the color we purchased was the Rose, its true to the color in the picture~so glad I got this
customer_reviews.author: Joy4Joy

customer_reviews.title: Snags in the border around it looks terrible
customer_reviews.text: Showed up today & I was so excited to get it on the guest room bed ... the color is perfect the size and weight is pretty perfect the only issue is the snags all the way around the border ... not happy about that at all
customer_reviews.author: VegasBaby

customer_reviews.title: Very nice blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice blanket! I love that it’s stain resistant, and my daughter loves the satin edge. It is a good size and very soft. I will be ordering more for the rest of the family!
customer_reviews.author: hrs

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy and hot :(
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this the texture was scratchy and too hot. I know it’s supposed to be warm but it made me sweat I didn’t like it at all. It is pretty well made I just didn’t personally like it.
customer_reviews.author: jujumama

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket in my 70 years
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 5-6 of these blankets. They are soft, they are light weight, they keep you warm. I give them as gifts and now my friends are buying them. I love them, obviously. They are perfect as an all year round blanket. Washing them..they come out like new.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS MY FAVORITE BLANKET
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've bought this blanket and I love it! The satin is so silky and comfortable. It's a warm blanket but comfortable enough to keep on the bed in summer. My first blanket last over three years of being washed, traveling with and camping.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than before
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd blanket I have purchased. The price is right but this one has much less fill than the first one I purchased several years ago. Really a very nice blanket for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this "need" to have satin trimmed blankets all my life. I run my fingers / toes through it (i know - weird), in order to relax / fall asleep. I absolutely love this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: BellasMommy0717

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for southern winters!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket! As I was hoping, it's extra wide so my husband and I both get plenty of covers at night. Its also incredibly easy to wash and dry. I highly recommend this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gilles

customer_reviews.title: Great summer blanket
customer_reviews.text: Awesome summer blanket! Much better than a sheet but not too heavy. Lightweight, soft, doesn’t make you sweat. It will be too light for me during the winter as Im usually cold, but I think my boyfriend will use it as he runs hot. Def glad I bought it and will use it most of the year!
